entry.title: FOIA Request - Galesburg CUSD 205
entry.content:
Download: FOIA Request - CUSD 205

The preceding is the original document I received from Galesburg Community Unit School District #205, in response to the request I filed last week under the Freedom of Information Act.

Iâ€™ll post more pertinent excerpts from this document as they are reviewed. However, in the interest of full disclosure, I post the original here for public dissemination.
